message: Those who trap victims are always on the move and often rely on places like convenience stores, rest stops and hotels. So, this Zip-Trip on Euclid Avenue makes certain if a victim walks in, they will know how to get help.

data.description: HELENA, Mont.- Manager of the Zip-Trip Bryce Ackart said convenience stores are at the front lines for helping human trafficking victims and spotting their captors. The "more than convenience, we ...
data.title: Convenience store helps stop human trafficking
